title: Compiling with sanitizers results in "Interceptors are not working" error
body:
Steps:

```
https://github.com/dtolnay/thiserror.git
cd thiserror
export RUSTFLAGS='-Zsanitizer=address'
cargo build
```

Output:

```
    Updating crates.io index
   Compiling proc-macro2 v1.0.24
   Compiling unicode-xid v0.2.1
   Compiling syn v1.0.54
   Compiling quote v1.0.7
   Compiling thiserror-impl v1.0.22 (/Users/coreyf/tmp/thiserror/impl)
   Compiling thiserror v1.0.22 (/Users/coreyf/tmp/thiserror)
==60012==ERROR: Interceptors are not working. This may be because AddressSanitizer is loaded too late (e.g. via dlopen). Please launch the executable with:
DYLD_INSERT_LIBRARIES=/Users/coreyf/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/librustc-nightly_rt.asan.dylib
"interceptors not installed" && 0
error: could not compile `thiserror`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name thiserror --edition=2018 src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=6dd48603ada55e15 -C extra-filename=-6dd48603ada55e15 --out-dir /Users/coreyf/tmp/thiserror/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/Users/coreyf/tmp/thiserror/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/Users/coreyf/tmp/thiserror/target/debug/deps --extern thiserror_impl=/Users/coreyf/tmp/thiserror/target/debug/deps/libthiserror_impl-c50b566564a7005f.dylib -Zsanitizer=address` (signal: 6, SIGABRT: process abort signal)
```

Platform:

```
rustc 1.50.0-nightly (1c389ffef 2020-11-24)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673
commit-date: 2020-11-24
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.50.0-nightly
```

This also occurs for me on `aarch64-apple-darwin`.
